channel.title: Di Sarli on Simba Tango

item.title: More Fast Transfers
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Aleera* I have previously discussed too fast transfers from 78s. Age Akkerman has a well researched take on Di Sarli’s El ciruja which he found to be about 5% too fast on the Euro Records transfer.
